role_description: An Ansible role that installs wrk on Linux and MacOS
role_description_full_overview: [wrk](https://github.com/reconquest/wrk) is a modern HTTP benchmarking tool capable of generating significant load when run on a single multi-core CPU. It combines a multithreaded design with scalable event notification systems such as epoll and kqueue
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs wrk on Linux and MacOS.
